QuestData.Title: We Can Fix It
QuestData.Description:
<This drill rig looks capable of breaking through the nearby debris, but is clearly broken.
If you can collect the parts required, Prince Erazmin should be able to show you how to repair it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Spare Parts and $2oa Energy Cell from enemies in Junkwatt Depot.

Objectives.Objective: Collect Energy Cell from Mechanized Chest
